content: if you are like me and you love having plants around but they keep dying on you or if you want to have a cactus but you are worried about pricking your fingers with it this cute snowman cactus tephrocactus geometricus is the perfect solution fast and easy to crochet it will bring joy to your home or office especially if you combine it with my other cacti the pdf includes step-by-step written instructions visual references and photo-tutorials to help you and it is available in english and spanish **sewing needed ** none **level ** beginner-intermediate you need to be familiar with the basic stitches used in amigurumi chains single_crochet us /double_crochet uk slip stitches increases invisible decreases and with back post and front post stitches working in the back loop only and joining two pieces together with single_crochet/double_crochet there are photo-tutorials to learn how to crochet back and front post stitches and how to work in the front or back loop only with both right- and left-handed versions if you need them **yarn and hooks ** you can use any yarn weight you prefer you only have to choose a suitable hook so you can crochet tight enough for the stuffing not to show feel free to contact me here or on instagram to give me your feedback or if you have any questions this pattern and its contents are only for personal use please do not copy edit redistribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to make and sell items using my pattern as long as you don t post the pattern anywhere and use your own photos to sell them please mention me as the designer when posting online or selling finished items thank you
